name: outpitch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in baseball, to pitch (= throw the ball toward the player with the bat) more effectively than other players: The Phillies outpitched and outhit the Rays.
More examplesFewer examplesThey had defensive lapses and they got out-pitched by Yukiko Ueno.Miller outpitched him again in a 7-1 Houston win.Through three months now, he's outpitched every other starter in baseball. The big right-hander struck out six and walked two in seven-plus innings, outpitching Chacon.
